metadata.name: Plan DB API Remediation
metadata.shortDescription: Translate DB↔API fit mismatches into delivery impact decisions and a phased remediation plan.
metadata.description: Reads the latest functional specification and OpenAPI contract together with a DB↔API fit analysis report, then produces (1) a decision-focused summary of the hardest mismatches and their delivery/user impact, (2) a must-have vs can-drop decision checkpoint, and (3) a phased remediation plan (schema changes, migration/backfill, rollout) when scope cannot be reduced.
objectives: Summarize DB↔API mismatches in delivery and user-impact terms
Identify non-negotiable requirements vs drop/postpone candidates
Produce SME/PO questions focused on time-to-deliver and existing-user impact
Draft a phased remediation plan (DB schema, migration/backfill, rollout strategy)
metadata.author: OLAF Framework
